title: Vi's taunts have no sounds/speech :/
body: Noticed this bug yesterday, when I went to taunt whilst waiting for a jungle camp I noticed there was no sound or speech; {{champion:254}}  successfully completes the animation but there are no sounds. :/

replies.body:
Were you spamming emotes? If one audio track isn't finished, the next track won't begin. The animation, however, would still play.

Was this with base Vi, or a skin?

Unless you are playing Zed, where you can just spam Taunt for "EMBRAEMBRAEMBRAEMBRAEMBRA" or other taunts.

Please don't remove it though

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=E0nX0oU6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-16T19:06:43.848+0000)
>
> Were you spamming emotes? If one audio track isn't finished, the next track won't begin. The animation, however, would still play.
> 
> Was this with base Vi, or a skin?

ty Katey for noticing this! :D
After each emote I left a few seconds so that the next track could play but nope, didn't work :/ It occurred with Officer Vi but I should try base Vi as well. I do not own neon strike Vi so I am unsure of that skin.

Thanks for the reply! I can check Neon Strike and Base Vi, no worries. :]

EDIT: Looks like it's only happening with Officer Vi. Good catch! We'll see what the issue is!

the same with her Q knock up.....it just dings and wont seem to go off visually or anything. at the beginning of the game i went through my blue monsters when i should have knocked them up {{champion:32}}
also i was using her debonair skin idk if that matters though. it happened a little while into the game when it stopped working completely.
Which skin were you using? Some skins have a visor (Neon Strike Vi) that toggle up / down when you taunt.
